insert into otherin(id, otherin_no, supplier_id, warehouse_id, state, remark, create_id, creator, create_time, update_id, updator, update_time, audit_id, auditor, audit_time) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.otherinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update otherin
otherin_no = #{otherinNo},
supplier_id = #{supplierId},
supplier_name = #{supplierName},
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId},
state = #{state},
remark = #{remark},
create_id = #{createId},
creator = #{creator},

update_id = #{updateId},
updator = #{updator},
update_time = #{updateTime},
audit_id = #{auditId},
auditor = #{auditor},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
company_id = #{companyId},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select otherin.id as id, otherin.otherin_no as otherinNo, otherin.state as state, otherin.remark as remark, otherin.warehouse_id as warehouseId, warehouse.name as warehouseName, otherin.create_id as createId, otherin.creator as creator, otherin.create_time as createTime, otherin.update_id as update_id, otherin.updator as updator, otherin.update_time as updateTime, otherin.audit_id as auditId, otherin.auditor as auditor, otherin.audit_time as auditTime, otherin.company_id as companyId from otherin,warehouse where otherin.warehouse_id = warehouse.id and otherin.create_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and otherin.id like concat('%',#{otherin.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.otherin_no like concat('%',#{otherin.otherinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.state like concat('%',#{otherin.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.remark like concat('%',#{otherin.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.warehouse_id like concat('%',#{otherin.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.create_time like concat('%',#{otherin.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherin.update_id like concat('%',#{otherin.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.updator like concat('%',#{otherin.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.update_time like concat('%',#{otherin.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and audit_id like concat('%',#{otherin.auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and auditor like concat('%',#{otherin.auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and audit_time like concat('%',#{otherin.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherin.company_id =#{otherin.companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by otherin.update_time desc

select otherin.id as id, otherin.otherin_no as otherinNo, otherin.state as state, otherin.remark as remark, otherin.warehouse_id as warehouseId, warehouse.name as warehouseName, otherin.create_id as createId, otherin.creator as creator, otherin.create_time as createTime, otherin.update_id as update_id, otherin.updator as updator, otherin.update_time as updateTime, otherin.audit_id as auditId, otherin.auditor as auditor, otherin.audit_time as auditTime, otherin.company_id as companyId from otherin,warehouse where otherin.warehouse_id = warehouse.id and otherin.audit_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and otherin.state = 0
and otherin.id like concat('%',#{otherin.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.otherin_no like concat('%',#{otherin.otherinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.remark like concat('%',#{otherin.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.warehouse_id like concat('%',#{otherin.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.create_id like concat('%',#{otherin.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.creator like concat('%',#{otherin.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.create_time like concat('%',#{otherin.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherin.update_id like concat('%',#{otherin.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.updator like concat('%',#{otherin.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.update_time like concat('%',#{otherin.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherin.company_id =#{otherin.companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by otherin.update_time desc

select otherin.id as id, otherin.otherin_no as otherinNo, otherin.state as state, otherin.remark as remark, otherin.warehouse_id as warehouseId, warehouse.name as warehouseName, otherin.create_id as createId, otherin.creator as creator, otherin.create_time as createTime, otherin.update_id as update_id, otherin.updator as updator, otherin.update_time as updateTime, otherin.audit_id as auditId, otherin.auditor as auditor, otherin.audit_time as auditTime from otherin,warehouse where otherin.warehouse_id = warehouse.id and otherin.audit_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and otherin.state in (1,2,4,5)
and otherin.id like concat('%',#{otherin.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.otherin_no like concat('%',#{otherin.otherinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.remark like concat('%',#{otherin.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.warehouse_id like concat('%',#{otherin.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.create_id like concat('%',#{otherin.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.creator like concat('%',#{otherin.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.create_time like concat('%',#{otherin.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherin.update_id like concat('%',#{otherin.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.updator like concat('%',#{otherin.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherin.update_time like concat('%',#{otherin.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherin.company_id =#{otherin.companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by otherin.update_time desc
